info.header: RSSAEGW043 - Delete Indirect Data Forward cause code
info.csv_title: Delete Indirect Data Forward cause code
info.help_text:
This report gives information about GTP-C v2 delete indirect data forwarding response messages sent per cause code on S11/S4 interfaces.
Use case specific instructions:
- This report can be used to troubleshoot the received 'Delete Indirect Data Forward Request' messages;
- Note, 'Ratio' column is applicable on DIDFRS level only.
info.report-description: Delete Indirect Data Forward cause code
info.report-title: Delete Indirect Data Forward cause code
